snippet: Armed tribesmen and uniformed troops in pickup trucks mounted with heavy weapons surrounded the airport and sent passengers’ vehicles away.
abstract: Armed tribesmen and uniformed troops in pickup trucks mounted with heavy weapons blcock access to the airport in Sana, Yemen; attack comes day after the new president, Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi, fired high-level security officials appointed by Ali Abdullah Saleh, who stepped down as president in February after a yearlong uprising.
lead_paragraph: Armed tribesmen and uniformed troops in pickup trucks mounted with heavy weapons surrounded the airport and sent passengers’ vehicles away.

headline.seo: Gunmen Loyal to Ex-Leader Strike the Main Airport in Yemen
headline.main: Main Airport in Yemen Is Captured by Gunmen

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
